TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit MethodBody extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对方法体的元数据和 MSIL 的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to the metadata and MSIL for the body of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供对本地变量和异常处理子句在方法正文中，信息和组成方法主体的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 访问。The class provides access to information about the local variables and exception-handling clauses in a method body, and to the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) that makes up the method body. 可以使用的模块类中，令牌解析方法，如， ，并，以在方法体中的标记解析对象，对象，和提供的对象有关类型、 方法和在方法体的 MSIL 访问的字段的详细的信息。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 分析方法体需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式的数据。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. 若要获取给定方法的对象，请首先获取对象的方法，然后调用对象的方法。To obtain a object for a given method, first obtain a object for the method, then call the object's method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 该示例使用属性来获取一系列对象，然后显示其类型和索引顺序。The example uses the property to obtain a list of objects and then displays their types and index order. 属性用于获取异常处理子句的列表。The property is used to obtain a list of exception-handling clauses. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类调用的构造期间对象。This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ExceptionHandlingClauses As IList(Of ExceptionHandlingClause)

summary.span: 获取在方法主体中包含所有异常处理的子句的列表。

span.span: Gets a list that includes all the exception-handling clauses in the method body.

value.span: 对象的 表示方法主体中异常处理的子句。

span.span: An of objects representing the exception-handling clauses in the body of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该列表包含所有 try 块中的所有子句在方法体中。The list includes all clauses from all try blocks in the method body. 每个对象包含标识与之关联的 try 块的信息。Each object contains information that identifies the try block with which it is associated. > [!NOTE] > 使用异常处理子句需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式的数据。Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`并显示有关其异常处理子句的信息。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays information about its exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. > [!NOTE] > 并非所有计算机语言可以都生成子句。Not all computer languages can generate clauses. Visual Basic 示例显示了筛选器子句，使用 Visual Basic`When`表达式，从其他语言的示例中省略。The Visual Basic example shows a filter clause, using a Visual Basic `When` expression, which is omitted from the examples for other languages. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetILAsByteArray() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetILAsByteArray () As Byte()
abstract member GetILAsByteArray : unit -> byte[] override this.GetILAsByteArray : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 以字节数组的形式返回用于方法体的 MSIL。

span.span: Returns the MSIL for the method body, as an array of bytes.

returns.span: 类型 的数组包含用于方法体的 MSIL。

span.span: An array of type that contains the MSIL for the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用的模块类中，令牌解析方法，如， ，并，以在方法体中的标记解析对象，对象，和提供的对象有关类型、 方法和在方法体的 MSIL 访问的字段的详细的信息。You can use the token-resolution methods of the module class, such as , , and , to resolve the tokens in the method body to objects, objects, and objects that provide detailed information about the types, methods, and fields accessed by the MSIL in the method body. > [!NOTE] > 分析方法体需要全面了解元数据和 MSIL 指令格式的数据。Parsing method bodies requires a thorough understanding of metadata and MSIL instruction formats. 信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property InitLocals As Boolean
public: virtual property bool InitLocals { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示方法体中的局部变量是否初始化为相应类型的默认值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether local variables in the method body are initialized to the default values for their types.

value.span: 如果方法体包含用于将局部变量初始化为 （对于引用类型）或者零初始值（对于值类型）的代码，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the method body contains code to initialize local variables to for reference types, or to the zero-initialized value for value types; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指的变量的显式未初始化，这就是，如使用语法声明的变量`int x;`C# 中或`Dim x As Integer`在 Visual Basic 中。The property refers to variables that are not explicitly initialized; that is, variables that are declared with syntax such as `int x;` in C# or `Dim x As Integer` in Visual Basic. 引用变量将初始化为`null`默认情况下。Reference variables are initialized to `null` by default. 数值变量初始化为零。Numeric variables are initialized to zero. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 和属性将显示。The and properties are displayed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property LocalSignatureMetadataToken As Integer
public: virtual property int LocalSignatureMetadataToken { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取签名的元数据标记，该签名描述元数据中的方法的局部变量。

span.span: Gets a metadata token for the signature that describes the local variables for the method in metadata.

value.span: 表示元数据标记的整数。

span.span: An integer that represents the metadata token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取有关方法的本地变量的信息。Use the property to obtain information about the method's local variables. > [!NOTE] > 有关本地变量签名的信息可在公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档中，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"。Information about local variable signatures can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property LocalVariables As IList(Of LocalVariableInfo)

summary.span: 获取方法体中声明的局部变量的列表。

span.span: Gets the list of local variables declared in the method body.

value.span: 对象的一个 ，这些对象描述在方法体中声明的局部变量。

span.span: An of objects that describe the local variables declared in the method body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要提供的局部变量签名的元数据标记属性。You do not need the metadata token for the local variable signature provided by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`并显示其本地变量信息。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 属性用于获取一系列对象。The property is used to obtain a list of objects. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MaxStackSize As Integer
public: virtual property int MaxStackSize { int get(); };

summary.span: 执行方法时，获取操作堆栈上的项的最大数目。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

value.span: 执行方法时操作数堆栈上的项的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of items on the operand stack when the method is executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，尤其是"分区 II:: 元数据定义和语义"和"分区 III: CIL 指令集"。For more information, see the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set". 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为测试方法`MethodBodyExample`，并显示其本地变量的信息和异常处理子句。The following code example defines a test method named `MethodBodyExample` and displays its local variable information and exception-handling clauses. 方法用于获取测试方法的对象。The method is used to obtain a object for the test method. 和属性将显示。The and properties are displayed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[MethodBody#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodBody/VB/source.vb#5)]
